Projects.title: COMS: Club and Organization Management System
body: My First large project and Capstone Project for IT Capstone 1-2.
A web application designed to assist STI College Alabang's clubs and organizations in managing recruitment, events, meetings, and document processing through e-signatures/digital signing.

Projects.title: Java File Sorter (Console Application)
body: A simple console app used to sort the active directory and segregate every file based on their file extension using Java only
